import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; // import bgimage from "./components/rose-petals.svg" import Typewriter from "typewriter-effect"; import project1 from "./img/project-1.png"; import project2 from "./img/project-2.png"; import project3 from "./img/project-3.png"; import { isMobile } from "react-device-detect"; function App() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); function handleClick() { let btn = document.getElementById("mobile-toggle"); if (btn.className === "mobile-nav-active") { btn.setAttribute("class", ""); } else { btn.setAttribute("class", "mobile-nav-active"); // btn.setAttribute("style",'{{ width: "0%" }}') // btn2.setAttribute("style",'{{ width: "100%" }}') } } useEffect(() => { // simulate loading data from an API setTimeout(() => { setLoading(false); }, 500); }, []); return (

Shivam Verma

I'm a

{/* ABOUT */}

About

I am an Associate Software Engineer at Persuit, where I specialize in end-to-end development and API integration. As a recent graduate (2024) with a B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering from IIT Jodhpur, I've successfully transitioned into software development, combining my engineering background with cutting-edge technology skills.


My technical expertise spans both frontend and backend development, with proficiency in React.js, Next.js, Express.js, GraphQL, and MongoDB. I have extensive experience in developing and integrating external APIs, implementing OpenAPI specifications, and building scalable web applications. My work involves creating robust, maintainable code while following industry best practices and modern development workflows.


I'm passionate about creating efficient, user-centric solutions and have a proven track record of delivering high-quality software products. My experience includes working with agile methodologies, version control systems, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines. I'm constantly expanding my knowledge and staying current with the latest technology trends to deliver innovative solutions.

{/* SKILLS */}

Technical Skills

Frontend Development

  • React.js: Component development, state management, hooks
  • Next.js: Server-side rendering, routing, API routes
  • Modern JavaScript: ES6+, TypeScript
  • UI/UX: Responsive design, Bootstrap, Material-UI

Backend Development

  • Node.js/Express.js: RESTful APIs, middleware
  • GraphQL: Schema design, resolvers, Apollo Server
  • MongoDB: Database design, aggregation, indexing
  • API Development: OpenAPI specs, documentation
{/* PROJECTS */}

Featured Projects

Tailor's portfolio

Portfolio feature for tailors using React, Redux, Bootstrap, and other utility functions

Bomb.money dashboard

Web3 platform created using React, material UI, and integrating metamask wallet

Lens.ai user's account

Web app using React, fetching data from apis for a user and providing sorting options

{/* CONTACT */}

Contact

Thank you for taking the time to visit my portfolio! I am always open to new opportunities and would love to hear from you. If you are interested in working together, or just want to chat about a project or opportunity, please don't hesitate to reach out. You can contact me through the following channels:
